title: Bilawal, Iraqi interior minister discuss matters of bilateral relations
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 6 (APP):Foreign Minister Bilawal Bhutto Zardari on Tuesday met with the Iraqi interior minister Abdul Amir al Shammari in Baghdad and discussed matters of bilateral relations.
During the meeting, the two sides agreed to enhance cooperation in raising human relations of both sides.
Flexible visa regime for Pakistani pilgrims and business community was also discussed in the meeting.
